contextId.information: The abstract noun "wrath" can be stated as the adjective "angry." AT: "I will not come to you and be angry with you" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: I will not come in wrath

contextId.information: Here the act of God having compassion is spoken of as if it were an object that someone experiencing that compassion had found. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
